---
In JavaScript:

{% highlight javascript %}
(function(){
  //assign the whole thing into a string
  //convert the string into an array
  //loop through the array
  //starting with the first 5, add up the values of the array and store it
  //compare the next set with the previous set, if it's bigger, store it, it smaller, toss it out
  //99879 - 42
  var number = "";
  var high = 0, five = [];

  for (var i = 0; i < number.length; i++){
    var c = number.charAt(i);
    five.push(c);
    if (five.length > 5){
      five.shift();
    }
    if (five.length === 5){
      var total = 0;
      for (var j = 0; j < five.length; j++){
        total += five[j] - 0;
        if (total > high){
          high = total;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  document.write(high, "<br />");
})();
{% endhighlight %}

on "GitHub":http://github.com/davidwparker/project_euler/blob/b1206536f8c25af9f18a7010ff49d89606f68e06/javascript/0008.html
